pr_title: Add minimal help to add-ons without any

timeline.author: kingthorin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@ + + + + + +Directory List v1.0 + + + +

Directory List v1.0

+Provides a file with directory names to be used with "Forced Browse" add-on.

replies.bodyText: Right, this is the description of the add-on, will tweak that too.
replies.author: thc202

timeline.message:
Add minimal help to add-ons without any

Add help with basic description of what the add-ons do/provide.
Tweak names of some add-ons (e.g. title case, remove "extension").

Signed-off-by: thc202 <thc202@gmail.com>
